Notes: These are usually not visible until Bowser activates them during the final fight. These fly to their actual position and will remain there. The orb can be smashed into Bowser.

Obj_arg0.Name: First Appearance Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: Delay until the rock appears for the first time.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
